TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Timer extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 實作一個在使用者定義的間隔引發事件的計時器。

span.span: Implements a timer that raises an event at user-defined intervals.

summary.span: 最佳化這個計時器以用於 Windows Forms 應用程式，並且必須用於視窗中。

span.span: This timer is optimized for use in Windows Forms applications and must be used in a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A用來在使用者定義的時間間隔引發事件。A is used to raise an event at user-defined intervals. 此 Windows 計時器專為單一執行緒的環境，其中將 UI 執行緒用來執行處理。This Windows timer is designed for a single-threaded environment where UI threads are used to perform processing. 它需要，使用者程式碼有可用的 UI 訊息幫浦且一律從相同的執行緒操作或封送處理到另一個執行緒呼叫。It requires that the user code have a UI message pump available and always operate from the same thread, or marshal the call onto another thread. 當您使用此計時器時，使用事件執行輪詢作業，或在顯示一段指定時間啟動顯示畫面。When you use this timer, use the event to perform a polling operation or to display a splash screen for a specified period of time. 每當屬性設定為`true`並屬性大於零，為基礎的間隔引發事件屬性設定。Whenever the property is set to `true` and the property is greater than zero, the event is raised at intervals based on the property setting. 這個類別提供方法以設定的間隔，以及啟動和停止計時器。This class provides methods to set the interval, and to start and stop the timer. > [!NOTE] > Windows Form Timer 元件是單一執行緒，並僅限於 55 毫秒精確度。The Windows Forms Timer component is single-threaded, and is limited to an accuracy of 55 milliseconds. 如果您需要多執行緒的計時器以更高的精確度時，使用類別中命名空間。If you require a multithreaded timer with greater accuracy, use the class in the namespace. ## Examples 下列範例會實作簡單的間隔計時器，它會發出警示，設定每隔五秒。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 發生警示時，顯示的警示已啟動並提示使用者計時器是否應該繼續執行的次數計數。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user as to whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新的計時器時，就會停用;亦即設為`false`。When a new timer is created, it is disabled; that is, is set to `false`. 若要啟用計時器，請呼叫方法或一組至`true`。To enable the timer, call the method or set to `true`. 如果已停用計時器，計時器會超出範圍，記憶體回收發生時，將會處置計時器。If the timer is disabled and the timer is out of scope, the timer will be disposed when garbage collection occurs. 如果啟用計時器時，即使它不在範圍內，它不會進行記憶體回收。If the timer is enabled, even if it is out of scope, it is not subject to garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container) cil managed

span.span: An that represents the container for the timer.

summary.span: 使用指定的容器，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class together with the specified container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式可讓您將建立關聯任何物件。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 產生關聯像這樣，您交給控制項的存留期至。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果您在應用程式中使用多個元件，而且想要同時處置所有人都可以是很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 比方說，如果您將建立關聯，則，和具有，則呼叫上會強制所有這些元件，也可供使用。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the will force disposal of all of these components as well. 建立新的計時器時，就會停用;亦即設為`false`。When a new timer is created, it is disabled; that is, is set to `false`. 若要啟用計時器，請呼叫方法或一組至`true`。To enable the timer, call the method or set to `true`. 這個執行個體將會存在，直到它的容器釋放記憶體回收。This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.

summary.span: 處置計時器所使用記憶體之外的資源。

span.span: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫當您完成使用計時器。Call when you are finished using the timer. 方法會使計時器處於無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the timer in an unusable state. 在您呼叫後，您必須釋放所有計時器參考，讓它所佔用的記憶體可以回收記憶體回收。After you call , you must release all references to the timer so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 請務必呼叫發行計時器您最後一個參考之前。Always call before you release your last reference to the timer. 否則，計時器所使用的資源將不會釋放記憶體回收呼叫計時器物件的解構函式之前。Otherwise, the resources the timer is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the destructor of the timer object.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計時器時，不會進行記憶體回收的值是`true`。The timer is not subject to garbage collection when the value is `true`. 呼叫方法是設定相同至`true`。Calling the method is the same as setting to `true`. 同樣地，呼叫方法是設定相同至`false`。Likewise, calling the method is the same as setting to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會實作簡單的間隔計時器，它會發出警示，設定每隔五秒。The following example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 發生警示時，顯示的警示已啟動並提示使用者，是否應該繼續執行的計時器的次數計數。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 事件相對於上一次發生 事件而引發之前，取得或設定時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, before the event is raised relative to the last occurrence of the event.

value.span: 會在 事件相對於上次發生 事件而引發之前指定毫秒數。

span.span: An specifying the number of milliseconds before the event is raised relative to the last occurrence of the event.
The value cannot be less than one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得的秒數間隔中，請將此數字除以 1000。To get the number of seconds in the interval, divide this number by 1,000. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作簡單的間隔計時器，它會發出警示，設定每隔五秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 發生警示時，顯示的警示已啟動並提示使用者，是否應該繼續執行的計時器的次數計數。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.
This is always .
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個計時器刻度會呼叫這個方法。This method is called for each timer tick. 它會呼叫任何方法，會透過新增。It calls any methods that are added through . 如果您繼承自，您可以覆寫這個方法。If you are inheriting from , you can override this method. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 當覆寫在衍生類別中，請確定您呼叫基底類別的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class's method.

span.span: Starts the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以藉由設定啟動計時器屬性設`true`。You can also start the timer by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作簡單的間隔計時器，它會發出警示，設定每隔五秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 發生警示時，顯示的警示已啟動並提示使用者，是否應該繼續執行的計時器的次數計數。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Stops the timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以藉由設定停止計時器屬性設`false`。You can also stop the timer by setting the property to `false`. A物件可能已啟用和停用相同的應用程式工作階段中多次。A object may be enabled and disabled multiple times within the same application session. 呼叫已停用之後藉由呼叫會導致重新啟動中斷的時間間隔。Calling after you have disabled a by calling will cause the to restart the interrupted interval. 如果您設定在 5000 毫秒間隔內，而且您呼叫在大約 3000 毫秒，呼叫會導致之前要等待 5000 毫秒引發事件。If your is set for a 5000-millisecond interval, and you call at around 3000 milliseconds, calling will cause the to wait 5000 milliseconds before raising the event. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫停止任何在 Windows Forms 應用程式可能會導致訊息從其他元件中的應用程式，以立即處理，因為所有主應用程式執行緒上運作的元件。Calling Stop on any within a Windows Forms application can cause messages from other components in the application to be processed immediately, because all components operate on the main application thread. 如果您有兩個元件，其中一個設定為 700 毫秒以及一組為 500 毫秒，而且您呼叫第一天，您的應用程式可能會先收到第二個元件的事件回呼。If you have two components, one set to 700 milliseconds and one set to 500 milliseconds, and you call on the first , your application may receive an event callback for the second component first. 如果這證明有問題，請考慮使用類別中命名空間改。If this proves problematic, consider using the class in the namespace instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作簡單的間隔計時器，它會發出警示，設定每隔五秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 發生警示時，顯示的警示已啟動並提示使用者，是否應該繼續執行的計時器的次數計數。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法類別內事件可能無法如預期般運作，以顯示 [判斷提示] 對話方塊方塊可能會造成要引發的 Windows事件重複。Calling the method on the class from within the event may not behave as expected, as displaying the assertion dialog box may cause Windows to raise the event repeatedly. 我們建議您避免測試判斷提示，在此情況下，並使用， ， ，或方法改為。We recommend that you refrain from testing assertions within this event, and use the , , , or methods instead. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作簡單的間隔計時器，它會發出警示，設定每隔五秒。The following code example implements a simple interval timer, which sets off an alarm every five seconds. 發生警示時，顯示的警示已啟動並提示使用者，是否應該繼續執行的計時器的次數計數。When the alarm occurs, a displays a count of the number of times the alarm has started and prompts the user whether the timer should continue to run. [!code-cpp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Timer Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Timer Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]
